author: cziegeler
msg: Applying patch from Juergen Seitz (juergen.seitz@basf-it-services.com) and Bjoern Luetkemeier (bluetkemeier@s-und-n.de):
- Added ErrorHandler to PipelinesNode (hierarchical error handling)
- Fixing bug when error handler does not handle the error: the exception is now rethrown
